casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Appeal of: MICHELIN NORTH AMERICA, INC. No. 171P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Alexander P. Sands, III, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, David S. Pokela, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Michelin North America, Inc. Ronald L. Gibson, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County. Kenneth R. Murphy, III, Attorney at Law, Allison Pope Cooper, Attorney at Law, Wilson, for Wake County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 20th of May 2016 by Michelin North America, Inc. in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
